::Spears::

She fell to her knees, "please master, don't hurt him. Please."
She begged at Prebon's feet, "I'll do anything. But don't hurt him."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Sorry I haven't been posting. My net's been down most of the day.)
> 
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon laughed at the statements this bot was making. He had no 
idea 
> the peril he was in.
> 
> "Thank you for your support, Spears, but I can handle this. 
Striker, 
> I really would'nt be doing this if I were you. YHou are in alot of 
> trouble. Ramulus willl come if I tell him to. Especially when I 
> threaten yours and Sprears life. But don't worry, you'll get to go 
> free once I meet with him. I'll even have your memory wiped. Even 
the 
> memories of loving Spears, so you can forget about her. Now, I will 
> show you that insolence is not tolerated!"
> 
> Prebon closed the hole and sent a comm to Hammer.
> 
> "Activate Torture guns."
> 
> "Sure thing, boss."
> 
> Inside the cell two plasma cannons came out of panels and aimed at 
> Striker.
> 
> "Kepp firing until he is dead or says mercy."
> 
> The guns opened fire.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix looked at the group.
> 
> "I've got a plan. It'll take some time, though. We've brought back 
> major computer boards. This is like our day stuff. Top notch. We 
> could use this new computer to scan around their base, for ways to 
> attack. Who's in?"
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream sat in one of the chairs. The smell of mech fluid 
excited 
> him. He made a mental note not to double-cross Zardus.
> 
> "Alright. I'm here to tell you that you are all in very big 
trouble. 
> Megatron is not lost. He's just gone out of social view for the 
time 
> being. He's working on something big. He's trying to unite the two 
> Pred factions into one under his rule. Rumour has it he's been 
> working with some Vok people, old Predacons revived. I don't know 
> their names. All I know is that if Megatron's plan goes through, 
> we're all doomed. Now, I;m a part of the faction that is 
technically 
> Megatron's, even though both are basically his. After repeateds by 
> Maximals that left us baseless, members fleeing and two membres 
near 
> death, I gave a mutiny speech. Have our group leave Megatron, ally 
> with you and help you in anyway we can. It wen't over well with 
some, 
> but not Phobia, who is acting as our leader. He chose to go to Hell 
> Beast's old base. Now, it's closer than this is. So maybe he's only 
> concerned about getting our people to CR Chambers. Or maybe he's in 
> on Megatron's plot. I couldn't decide, but I couldn't take the 
risk, 
> so i fought for the position to come here. I thought if I went to 
the 
> Pred base that Phobia would rat me out and that I would die in the 
CR 
> Chamber. I will have to have a talk with Phobia. Speaking of CR 
> Chambers, could I use one? I'm pretty banged up here. So, you've 
been 
> warned Zardus. What will you do?"
